Package com.percussion.workflow.mail

Interface Summary
IPSMailMessageContext This interface defines methods to access the mail message related data.
IPSMailProgram Rhythmyx workflow engine uses javax mail to send mail notifications for the workflow by default.
 

Exception Summary
PSMailException This exception is thrown when Mail Program plugin fails to send a mail message for some reason.
